title._content: Image taken from page 6 of 'Review. The Tomb of the Martyrs, adjoining the United States Navy Yard, Brooklyn City, ... who died in dungeons ... in and about the city of New York, during the several years of our Revolutionary War'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Review.
